title: An epitaph upon the Solemn League and Covenant. Condemned to be burnt by the common hangman.
author: E. H.
publisher: printed for Philemon Stephens the younger, at the Kings Arms over agains the Middle-Temple-Gate in Fleetstreet,
notes: Verse - "So young? and must thou, like an old witch, burn?".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
